pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 24  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 6    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Mansions, Raids $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)The $(thing)Evoker$() has two different attack methods: fang attack and summoning $(thing)Vexes$().
